name: Kuma
description:
You are charged with running maze experiments with a mouse-like creature called Kuma. Every action will build or destroy trust between you and Kuma, and your choices will ultimately determine how Kuma acts and the choices he makes.

Current contrrols - WASD or Arrow keys to move player. E and Q to switch between walk mode and screen mode. While in screen mode, number keys make choices.       

Pre-alpha build. Please feel free to provide feedback to help further development.

Being made as part of Grads in Games Search for a Star game development challenge.  https://gradsingames.com/game-dev-challenges/
